Is this possible ?

Copying a differencing vhd in to ram and booting it from there.

I had no luck with grub4dos so far, if anyone knows where should i be looking, please point me.

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
> Is this possible ?
>
> Copying a differencing vhd in to ram and booting it from there.
>
> I had no luck with grub4dos so far, if anyone knows where should i be looking, please point me.

No.

grub4dos can only deal with "staic" VHD's and (in some trelatively recent release) has some support for Dynamic ones, but no "Differencing" AFAIK.
